statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT company_name, emission_type, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000;
SELECT activity_name, offsetting_cost FROM offsetting_activities ORDER BY offsetting_cost DESC;
SELECT company_name, emission_type, emission_amount, offsetting_activity FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT company_name, emission_type, emission_amount, offsetting_activity FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT company_name, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000 ORDER BY emission_amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, offsetting_activity FROM carbon_emissions JOIN emission_offsets ON carbon_emissions.id = emission_offsets.emission_id;
SELECT * FROM offsetting_activities WHERE offsetting_cost < 500 AND activity_type = 'Planting Trees' ORDER BY activity_name ASC;

SELECT company_name, emission_amount, offsetting_activity FROM carbon_emissions JOIN emission_offsets ON carbon_emissions.id = emission_offsets.emission_id JOIN offsetting_activities ON emission_offsets.activity_id = offsetting_activities.id WHERE emission_amount > 5000 AND offset_amount < 1000 ORDER BY emission_amount DESC, offset_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, emission_value FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_value > 100;
SELECT MAX(emission_value) AS max_emission FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT location, date_recorded FROM carbon_emissions WHERE location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY date_recorded ASC;
SELECT ce.location, oa.activity_type FROM carbon_emissions ce JOIN offsetting_activities oa ON ce.id = oa.emission_id;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_value > 100 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(emission_value) AS average_emission FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY location;
SELECT c.id, c.location, o.activity_type, o.date_completed FROM carbon_emissions c INNER JOIN offsetting_activities o ON c.id = o.emission_id;
SELECT location, MAX(emission_value) AS max_emission FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY location HAVING max_emission > 200;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE location LIKE 'U%' OR location LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM companies;
SELECT company_name FROM companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT emission_date, emitted_tons FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emitted_tons > 1000;
SELECT company_name, emitted_tons, emission_date FROM companies JOIN carbon_emissions ON companies.company_id = carbon_emissions.company_id;
SELECT company_name, offset_tons, offset_price FROM companies JOIN carbon_offsetting ON companies.company_id = carbon_offsetting.company_id WHERE offset_tons > 500;
SELECT company_name, company_size FROM companies;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emitted_tons > 100;
SELECT company_name, offset_tons FROM companies JOIN carbon_offsetting ON companies.company_id = carbon_offsetting.company_id;
SELECT company_name, emission_date FROM companies JOIN carbon_emissions ON companies.company_id = carbon_emissions.company_id ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, offset_price FROM companies JOIN carbon_offsetting ON companies.company_id = carbon_offsetting.company_id WHERE offset_price < 50000;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT id, emission_source, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT emission_source, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emissions FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY emission_source;
SELECT id, activity_name, activity_type FROM offsetting_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Renewable Energy';
SELECT * FROM emission_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT emission_source, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 100;
SELECT emission_source, emission_date FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM offsetting_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Renewable Energy';
SELECT e.emission_source, a.activity_name FROM carbon_emissions e JOIN emissions_offset eo ON e.id = eo.emission_id JOIN offsetting_activities a ON a.id = eo.activity_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry, location FROM CompanyInfo WHERE founding_date < '2000-01-01';
SELECT id, emission_type, emission_amount FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, report_type, report_date FROM Reporting WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM CompanyInfo ORDER BY founding_date DESC;
SELECT id, offset_amount FROM OffsetActivities WHERE offset_amount > 100 ORDER BY offset_date ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.report_type, r.report_date FROM Users u JOIN Reporting r ON u.id = r.user_id WHERE r.status = 'pending';
